trans-unit.source: Contains system colors, system brushes, and system resource keys that correspond to system display elements.
trans-unit.target: 包含對應至系統顯示項目的系統色彩、系統筆刷和系統資源索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: You cannot declare this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], but you can use its static properties to assign values in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 您無法宣告這個 managed 的類別[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，但是您可以使用靜態屬性指派值在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" /> that is the color of the active window's border.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" />，其為使用中視窗框線的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" /> with its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color" /> set to the color of the active window's border.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color" /> 設定為使用中視窗框線的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The returned brush's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true" />, so it cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回筆刷的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" />，因此無法修改。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ResourceKey" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" /> used to paint the active window's border.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來繪製作用中視窗框線之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ResourceKey" />。

trans-unit.source: The resource key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" /> used to paint the active window's border.
trans-unit.target: 用來繪製作用中視窗框線之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" /> 的資源索引碼。

trans-unit.source: This brush's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true" />, so it cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆刷的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" />，所以無法修改。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors.ActiveBorderBrushKey%2A> to create a dynamic reference to the active border system brush.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.SystemColors.ActiveBorderBrushKey%2A>建立作用中的框線系統筆刷動態參考。

trans-unit.source: This dynamic reference will automatically update if the brush is changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果變更筆刷，這個動態參考會自動更新。

trans-unit.source: To create a static reference that does not update automatically, use <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors.ActiveBorderBrush%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立靜態的參考，不會自動更新，請使用<xref:System.Windows.SystemColors.ActiveBorderBrush%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure that is the color of the active window's border.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 結構，這是使用中視窗框線的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The color of the active window's border.
trans-unit.target: 使用中視窗框線的色彩。

trans-unit.target: 作用中視窗框線之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 的資源索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: This brush's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true" />, so it cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆刷的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" />，所以無法修改。

trans-unit.source: This dynamic reference will automatically update if the brush is changed.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure that is the color of the text in the client area of a window.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為視窗工作區中文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The color of the text in the client area of a window.
trans-unit.target: 視窗工作區中文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ResourceKey" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> of text in a window's client area.
trans-unit.target: 取得視窗工作區中文字之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ResourceKey" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The resource key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> of text in a window's client area.
trans-unit.target: 視窗工作區中文字之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 的資源索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors.WindowTextColorKey%2A> to create a dynamic reference to the window text system color.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.SystemColors.WindowTextColorKey%2A>建立動態參考視窗文字系統色彩。

trans-unit.source: This dynamic reference will automatically update if the color is changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果變更色彩，此動態參考會自動更新。

trans-unit.source: To create a static reference that does not update automatically, use <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors.WindowTextColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立靜態的參考，不會自動更新，請使用<xref:System.Windows.SystemColors.WindowTextColor%2A>。
